effect.x_y: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Makes the target act next this turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Makes the target act next this turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
